Let's Connect With over 4 Decades of Hotel Operations Experience , Lighthouse Hospitality Group, LLC Provides Hands-on Leadership At Lighthouse Hospitality Group, LLC, we have a rich history of transforming properties into successful hospitality ventures. Our team is dedicated to creating exceptional experiences for guests, and our passion for hospitality drives everything we do. We take pride in our ability to elevate properties to their fullest potential, setting new standards of excellence in the industry. MEET OUR TEAM ANDREW ANDERSON  |  Co-Owner/President of Operations 30+ years of hotel experience in Property, Dual-Property, and Above Property Management ​ Hotel Experience in the Following States : Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa, Nebraska, North Dakota, Colorado, Washington, Minnesota Experience with the Following Brands : Fairfield Inn, Fairfield Inn & Suites, Residence Inn by Marriott, Courtyard by Marriott, TownPlace Suites, Comfort Inn, Comfort Suites, Sleep Inn, Sleep Inn & Suites, MainStay Suites, Choice Ascend Collection, AmericInn by Wyndham, Cobblestone Hotel, Cobblestone Hotel & Suites, Boarders by Cobblestone, and Hampton Inn. Professional Notables : Board Member on various Chamber Boards, Convention & Visitor Boards, and Advisory Committee. Adjunct Facilitator at Fox Valley Technical College – Room Operations & Group Sales. Certified ServiceTrainer for Residence Inn by Marriott. Lead General Manager for Extended Stay Division. Performed Regional Manager/Area Director for over 24 hotels throughout Midwest. Achievements : General Manager for Service Award-Winning Hotels for 10 years. Started in industry from maintenance to above property management. Franchise Environment : Opened 8 hotels Extensive experience in the following disciplines: Room Operations Service Culture Training Team-Building Environment Human Resources Revenue Management Sales & Marketing Hotel Pre-Opening Brand Quality Assurance Budgeting and Profit & Loss Management Operating Manager & Above-Property Management Owner Relations. PATTI ANDERSON  |  Co-Owner/Administrator Over three decades of dedication and expertise to the hospitality industry Beginning her career as a Front Desk Supervisor, Patti developed a deep understanding of guest services and operational excellence from the ground up. Over the past 15 years, she has honed her leadership skills as a General Manager, where she has been instrumental in driving team success, enhancing guest experiences, and achieving operational and financial goals. Known for her hands-on leadership style, Patti is passionate about empowering teams to exceed expectations and create memorable guest experiences. Her strategic approach to property management, combined with her ability to cultivate meaningful relationships with both staff and guests, has contributed to the success of numerous properties under her management. When she’s not focused on hospitality operations, Patti is dedicated to personal and professional growth. She constantly explores innovative strategies to stay ahead in the everevolving industry. As co-owner of Lighthouse Hospitality Group, she is committed to building strong partnerships and delivering exceptional results for every property under her care. Patti’s journey is a testament to hard work, lifelong learning, and a commitment to excellence. Whether leading a team, strategizing for growth, or ensuring every guest feels at home, Patti embodies the essence of hospitality. FAMILY VALUES Andrew and Patti have been happily married for 20 years and are proud co-owners of Lighthouse Hospitality Group, LLC. Together, they reside in Oshkosh, WI, where they enjoy raising their three children. Balancing family life with business ownership, Andrew and Patti are deeply committed to their family and the success of their growing management company. Their shared vision and dedication drive them forward as they navigate life and business together. HOTEL DEVELOPMENT SERVICES DON KLAIN  |  CHA President Four decades of hotel experience in Property, Dual-Property, and Above Property Management ​​ Hotel Experience in the Following States :​ New York, Kentucky, Minnesota, West Virginia, Michigan, Ohio, Indiana, Illinois, Pennsylvania, New Jersey, Wisconsin, Florida, North Dakota, Washington ​ Professional Notables: Certified Marriott Hotel Management Company Certified Choice Hotels Management Company Certified Hampton Hotel Management Company Choice Hotels Owners Council – nine years as National Delegate Region 13 Regional Director Chairman of Comfort Suites Committee – Choice Hotels Owners Council Vice Chair, Standards and Operations Committee – International Owners Council, Choice Hotel Marriott Franchise Advisory Committee Member of the Waukesha Area Technical College Advisory Board, Hospitality Program Guest Teacher, Waukesha County Technical College, Hospitality Program Owner Certified in Choice Hotels. Owner Certified in Hilton Hotels. Project Coordinator, University of Wisconsin, Madison Real-estate MBA Program Marquette University, Student Mentor Program, Real-estate Program Market Studies for Hotel Developers Developed the Extended Services/All Suites Division in the East for Tharaldson Grew Regional Marketing Department to accomplish aggressive sales in need markets Received Marriott’s “Quality Impact Manager” Award Grew Tharaldson Enterprises’ Region Four from 10 Hotels, and 2 Area Directors, to include: 68 hotels 6 Area Managers Regional Maintenance Manager Revenue Analyst Regional Revenue Analyst Field Education Director Regional Assistant. Raised REVPAR in comp hotels for twelve consecutive years ​ Franchisee and Franchisor Environment: Opened 59 hotels. Extensive experience in managing and system development in the following disciplines: P & Ls Capital Expenditures Budgeting Quality Assurance Sales and Marketing Revenue Management Human Resources PIPs Marriott Corporation Area Manager for the Fairfield Inn Brand working with Franchisees opening and operating Fairfield Inns. Marriott Corporation Senior General Manager.  Operated a Courtyard and Fairfield Inn simultaneously. Opening Team for Fairfield Inns Served on Marriott’s General Manager’s Council Our team is led by experienced professionals with a deep understanding of the hospitality industry. With a focus on delivering results and exceeding expectations, our leadership ensures that every project achieves the highest level of success. We are committed to innovation, sustainability, and the relentless pursuit of excellence.
